title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When previewing, no friendly error message is displayed when there is no data for a series.
EB: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed. Description: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the application and go to the preview section. 2. Select a series that has no data available. 3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
SR: 1. Open the application and go to the preview section. 2. Select a series that has no data available. 3. Verify that a friendly error message is displayed to inform the user that there is no data for the selected series.
